channel.title: [PI] Project Sony PvP [PI]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b][u]Project Sony PvP[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[center][u][b]Base [/b][/u][/center]
The base is Project Insanity reason being i picked this base is becuase the combat is very good and it is time to move on from delta and start working on repackaged servers ect.. i have tried many Packaged servers "hyperion" "shards" ect. Hyperion i had a little go at and i compared some stuff from hyperion to delta and i was amazed alot! so i fan thought alot of Packaged servers and found Project insanity was the best i could work with. It will be a Pking source so there will be no economy.
[center] [b]Why do you need a team?[/b][/center] To be very honest i don't like working solo i find it very boring and i don't get along with the word "solo" im a person that has to work as a team than solo so hope this answer your question :)
[center][b]VPS/HOST[/b][/center] The server will be hosted off my pc i have Low specs but i dont expect like 300 players with in 3 weeks... my pc can hold around 80 players max.. untill lagg comes in but i should have enuf money by then to upgrade to mayb a VPS/DEDI not sure yet it will most probaly be a powerfull vps!
[center][b] Goal[/b][/center] We dont really have a goal the only thing i can say is we are not trying to be a big server Like NRPK or SG and i no we wont even reach 50 players.... but its just fun.
[center][b]Website Infomation[/b][/center]
The website will be hosted off byethost untill we get an active server/site we will be using SMF becuase i won't be buying offshore host thats for sure... so im going to keep it to smf untill i have some extra cash for a forums like vbulletin but that wont be 100% there will be a webclient we might have a homepage to not sure atm.
[center][b] Skills[/b][/center] At this very moment all skills work accept Herblore farming and a few others im not going to bother with them ither since this is a pking server maybe later on ill add some skills Like "Herblore to make pots" "Farming for seeds" "Cooking & Fishing for food"
[center][b]Update log[/b][/center] [center]August the 31st - some shops have been edited [Nothing special] August the 31st - X10 hits have been added August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st -
[center][b]Pictures/GFX/Videos[/b][/center] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/3508/capture29.gif[/img] Soon to be posted Soon to be posted Soon to be posted Soon to be posted Soon to be posted Soon to be posted Soon to be posted[/center]
[center][b]Apply to join[/b][/center]
Name: Age: Email: How long have you bin around java?: Spot: [b]Source coder[/b] [b]Client coder[/b] [b]Web devolopment[/b] : How many hours can you spend?:
[center][b]Members[/b]
I Vain I Creazy pk3r jeddac[/center]
Thanks for viewing this thread ill try and get some pictures up
